verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

דַּבֵּ֞ר <WH1696> dab-Ber Speak אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> 'a-le-Hem, about אִ֕ישׁ <WH376> 'ish unto them When a man כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki When יַפְלִ֖א <WH6381> yaf-Li shall make a singular נֶ֑דֶר <WH5088> Ne-der; vow בְּעֶרְכְּךָ֥ <WH6187> be-'er-ke-Cha by thy estimation נְפָשֹׁ֖ת <WH5315> ne-fa-Shot the persons לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. [shall be] for the LORD

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become עֶרְכְּךָ֙ <WH6187> 'er-ke-Cha And thy estimation הַזָּכָ֔ר <WH2145> haz-za-Char, shall be of the male מִבֶּן֙ <WH1121> mib-Ben old עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim from twenty שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, years וְעַ֖ד <WH5704> ve-'Ad against בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- old שִׁשִּׁ֣ים <WH8346> shish-Shim even unto sixty שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah then עֶרְכְּךָ֗ <WH6187> 'er-ke-Cha, even thy estimation חֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim shall be fifty שֶׁ֥קֶל <WH8255> She-kel shekels כֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> Ke-sef of silver בְּשֶׁ֥קֶל <WH8255> be-She-kel after the shekel הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> hak-Ko-desh. of the sanctuary

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if נְקֵבָ֖ה <WH5347> ne-ke-Vah And if it [be] a female הִ֑וא <WH1931> hi he וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah then עֶרְכְּךָ֖ <WH6187> 'er-ke-Cha then thy estimation שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> she-lo-Shim shall be thirty שָֽׁקֶל׃ <WH8255> Sha-kel. shekels

וְאִ֨ם <WH518> ve-'Im If מִבֶּן־ <WH1121> mib-ben- old חָמֵ֜שׁ <WH2568> cha-Mesh And if [it be] from five שָׁנִ֗ים <WH8141> sha-Nim, years וְעַד֙ <WH5704> ve-'Ad against בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- old עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim even unto twenty שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, years וְהָיָ֧ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah then עֶרְכְּךָ֛ <WH6187> 'er-ke-Cha then thy estimation הַזָּכָ֖ר <WH2145> haz-za-Char shall be of the male עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty שְׁקָלִ֑ים <WH8255> she-ka-Lim; shekels וְלַנְּקֵבָ֖ה <WH5347> ve-lan-ne-ke-Vah and for the female עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <WH6235> 'a-Se-ret ten שְׁקָלִֽים׃ <WH8255> she-ka-Lim. shekels

וְאִ֣ם <WH518> ve-'Im if מִבֶּן־ <WH1121> mib-ben- old חֹ֗דֶשׁ <WH2320> Cho-desh, And if [it be] from a month וְעַד֙ <WH5704> ve-'Ad against בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- old חָמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> cha-Mesh even unto five שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> sha-Nim, years וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah then עֶרְכְּךָ֙ <WH6187> 'er-ke-Cha then thy estimation הַזָּכָ֔ר <WH2145> haz-za-Char, shall be of the male חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <WH2568> cha-mish-Shah five שְׁקָלִ֖ים <WH8255> she-ka-Lim shekels כָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> Ka-sef; of silver וְלַנְּקֵבָ֣ה <WH5347> ve-lan-ne-ke-Vah and for the female עֶרְכְּךָ֔ <WH6187> 'er-ke-Cha, thy estimation שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <WH7969> she-Lo-shet [shall be] three שְׁקָלִ֖ים <WH8255> she-ka-Lim shekels כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> Ka-sef. of silver

וְ֠אִם <WH518> Ve-'im If מִבֶּן־ <WH1121> mib-ben- old שִׁשִּׁ֨ים <WH8346> shish-Shim And if [it be] from sixty שָׁנָ֤ה <WH8141> sha-Nah years וָמַ֙עְלָה֙ <WH4605> va-Ma'-lah and above אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if זָכָ֔ר <WH2145> za-Char, if [it be] a male וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah then עֶרְכְּךָ֔ <WH6187> 'er-ke-Cha, then thy estimation חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <WH2568> cha-mish-Shah fif עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar teen שָׁ֑קֶל <WH8255> Sha-kel; shekels וְלַנְּקֵבָ֖ה <WH5347> ve-lan-ne-ke-Vah and for the female עֲשָׂרָ֥ה <WH6235> 'a-sa-Rah ten שְׁקָלִֽים׃ <WH8255> she-ka-Lim. shekels

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if מָ֥ךְ <WH4134> mach But if he be poorer הוּא֙ <WH1931> hu he מֵֽעֶרְכֶּ֔ךָ <WH6187> me-'er-Ke-cha, than thy estimation וְהֶֽעֱמִידוֹ֙ <WH5975> ve-he-'e-mi-Do then he shall present לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei himself before הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen, the priest וְהֶעֱרִ֥יךְ <WH6186> ve-he-'e-Rich shall value אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen; and the priest עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- according פִּ֗י <WH6310> Pi, him according to אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after תַּשִּׂיג֙ <WH5381> tas-Sig ability יַ֣ד <WH3027> yad who הַנֹּדֵ֔ר <WH5087> han-no-Der, that vowed יַעֲרִיכֶ֖נּוּ <WH6186> ya-'a-ri-Chen-nu value הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen. shall the priest ס sa-Mek

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- now if בְּהֵמָ֔ה <WH929> be-he-Mah, And if [it be] a beast אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יַקְרִ֧יבוּ <WH7126> yak-Ri-vu whereof men bring מִמֶּ֛נָּה <WH4480> mi-Men-nah as קָרְבָּ֖ן <WH7133> kor-ban an offering לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; unto the LORD כֹּל֩ <WH3605> kol any אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher such יִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> yit-Ten all that [any man] giveth מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu at לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of such unto the LORD יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> yih-yeh- become קֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> Ko-desh. shall be holy

לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo shall not יַחֲלִיפֶ֗נּוּ <WH2498> ya-cha-li-Fen-nu, He shall not alter וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- or יָמִ֥יר <WH4171> ya-Mir it nor change אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> o-To ט֥וֹב <WH2896> Tov it a good בְּרָ֖ע <WH7451> be-Ra' for a bad אוֹ־ <WH176> 'ov- or רַ֣ע <WH7451> ra' or a bad בְּט֑וֹב <WH2896> be-Tov; for a good וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if הָמֵ֨ר <WH4171> ha-Mer and if he shall at all יָמִ֤יר <WH4171> ya-Mir change בְּהֵמָה֙ <WH929> be-he-Mah beast בִּבְהֵמָ֔ה <WH929> biv-he-Mah, for beast וְהָֽיָה־ <WH1961> ve-ha-yah- shall become ה֥וּא <WH1931> hu and its וּתְמוּרָת֖וֹ <WH8545> u-te-mu-ra-To then it and the exchange יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> yih-yeh- shall become קֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> Ko-desh. thereof shall be holy

[part] thereof unto thy estimation

וְאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> ve-'Ish, And when a man כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- now if יַקְדִּ֨שׁ <WH6942> yak-Dish shall sanctify אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בֵּית֥וֹ <WH1004> bei-To his house קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> ko-desh [to be] holy לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, unto the LORD וְהֶעֱרִיכוֹ֙ <WH6186> ve-he-'e-ri-Cho shall estimate הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen, then the priest בֵּ֥ין <WH996> bein either ט֖וֹב <WH2896> Tov it whether it be good וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> u-Vein or רָ֑ע <WH7451> Ra'; or bad כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after יַעֲרִ֥יךְ <WH6186> ya-'a-Rich shall estimate אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> o-To הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen as the priest כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> ken so יָקֽוּם׃ <WH6965> ya-Kum. it so shall it stand
